name: Chimerical Conjuration
effect: The mage tears an object from Astral Space into the Fallen World. This spell functions similarly to Chimerical Manifestation, but the effect is permanent. The spell's target number is equal to the chimerical item's imbued item or Artifact rating (minimum 3). Casting this spell is an act of hubris, requiring a mage with a Wisdom higher than four dots to make a degeneration roll.
